GK16visa04cu:4: (lo, a) evaṃ kāvyasya svarūpamuktvā viśeṣaṃ nirūpayitumavatārayati--atheti---bhidyate aneneti bhedaḥ /

GK16visa04cu:472: “dhammille navamallikāsamudayo haste sitāmbhoruhaṃ hāraḥ kaṇṭhataṭe payodharayuge śrīkhaṇḍalepo ghanaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:476: atra kaviprauḍhoktisiddhena rūpakālaṅkāreṇa bhūmiṣṭho 'pi svargasthānāmupakāraṃ karoṣīti vibhāvanālaṅkāro vyajyate /
GK16visa04cu:482: eko 'pi tava kīrtirāśiḥ purandarapurīvāmabhruvāṃ surāṅganānāṃ vigrahe śarīre nānāmaṇḍanatāṃ yayau /
GK16visa04cu:490: sumukhai / yena tavādharapāṭalaṃ daśati bimbaphalaṃ śukaśāvakaḥ” //
GK16visa04cu:491: atrānena kavinibaddhasya kasyacitkāminaḥ prauḍhoktisiddhena vastunā tavādharaḥ puṇyātiśayalabhya iti vastu pratīyate /
GK16visa04cu:495: asau śukaśāvakaḥ kka nu śikhariṇi kasmin parvate kiyacciraṃ kimabhidhānaṃ kiṃ nāmakaṃ tapaḥ akarot /
GK16visa04cu:496: yena hetunā tava adharavat pāṭalaṃ bimbaphalaṃ daśāti /
GK16visa04cu:497: tava adharatulyavastudaṃśanamapi tapaḥ phalamiti ślokasya bhāvarathaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:501_1: vastunā śarāṇāṃ pañcatā śarān vimucya viyoginaḥ śriteve tyutprekṣālaṅkāro vyajyate /
GK16visa04cu:510: sambodhanāt kāmuka evātra vaktā natu kaviḥ /
GK16visa04cu:517: atra kavinibaddhavaktṛprauḍhoktisiddhenotprekṣālaṅkāreṇa kāmasyāyamunmādakaḥ kālaḥ prāptastatkathaṃ mānini mānaṃ na muñcasīti vastu vyajyate /
GK16visa04cu:524: ata eva kathaṃmānaṃ na muñcasi iti vyākhyā /
GK16visa04cu:530: (lo, ū) mahilāsahastrabharite tava hṛdaye subhaga sāmāntī /
GK16visa04cu:533: atrāmāantīti kavinibaddhavaktṛprauḍhoktisiddhena kāvyaliṅgālaṅkāreṇa tanostanūkaraṇo 'pi tava hṛdaye na vartata iti viśeṣoktyalaṅkāro vyajyate /
GK16visa04cu:540: nāyakasya bahunāyikābhāvanāduḥ khena kṛśāyā nāyikāyā avasthāṃ nāyake kathayantyāstatsakhyā uktiriyam /
GK16visa04cu:541_0: mahilā strī tāsāṃ sahastreṇa bharite tava hṛdaye amāntī avakāśamalabhamānā sā anudinaṃ
GK16visa04cu:541_1: divasaṃ vyāpya ananyakarmmā tyaktānyakāryyā satī tanu svataḥ kṛśaṃ aṅgaṃ tanayati
GK16visa04cu:545: hṛdaye na varttate iti---tanayatīti varttamānanirddeśāt adyāpi hṛdaye vṛttyalābhaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:548: (lo, ṛ) atreti---rūpaṇādayaḥ kavervyāpārāḥ kaveśca prādhānyavyaṅgyabodhanārthā rūpaṇādayo vyāpārā yathātra camatkurvanti na tathā vācyeṣu /
GK16visa04cu:549: rūpakādyalaṅkāreṣu hi vācyānāṃ rūpyāṇāṃ mukhādīnāmeva rūpaṇādivyāpārād rūpakādibhyaścandrādibhyaśca prādhānyamityarthaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:551: na khalu kaveḥ kavinibaddhasyeva rāgādyāviṣṭatā ataḥ kavinibaddhavaktṛprauḍhoktiḥ kaviprauḍhokteradhikaṃ sahṛdayavamatkārakāriṇīti pṛthakpratipāditā /
GK16visa04cu:554: (vi, ka) nanu---prauḍhoktisiddhatvenaiva ubhayasaṃgrahasambhave kimarthaṃ kavinibaddhavaktṛkatvena pṛthagupādānamityata āha-na khalviti /
GK16visa04cu:561: gāḍhakāntadaśanetyādau darśitasya virodhālaṅkārasya vyañjakasya vācakāpikārābhāvād vyaṅgyatvameva,
GK16visa04cu:562: evaṃ sajjayati surabhimāsa ityādau vasantādeḥ śarakaraṇadirūpavastuno vyañjakasya vyaṅgyatvameva ityato 'tra prāyaśa iti pūraṇīyam /
GK16visa04cu:564: ata eva lakṣyavyaṅgyayorapi vyañjakatvamudāhāryyamiti tenoktam nanu rūpaṇameva rūpakālaṅkāraḥ /
GK16visa04cu:566: vyatirecanameva vyatirekālaṅkāraḥ tathā ca yatra rūpakālaṅkārasya vyaṅgayatvam tatra kiṃ rūpyamānavastūdāharaṇaṃ na syāt /
GK16visa04cu:568: evamutprekṣyamāṇavyatiricyamānavastunorityata āha--eṣu ceti--tattad vastavapekṣayā tadalaṅkāra eva ādhikacamatkārīti tattadudāharaṇameva tattat iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:570: diśi mandāyate ityatra vyatirekālaṅkāraśca vyaṅgya uktaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:571: rūpakālaṅkāra vyaṅgyatvaṃ tu noktaṃ tathāpi--- calāpāṅgāṃ dṛṣṭiṃ spṛśasi bahuśo vepathumatī rahasyākhyāyīva svanasi mṛdu karṇāntikacaraḥ /
GK16visa04cu:572: karaṃ vyādhunvatyāḥ pibasi ratisarvasvamadharaṃ vayaṃ tattvānveṣānmadhukara /
GK16visa04cu:581: tattulyayuktike niḥ śeṣetyādau tadantikagamanaṃ lakṣyamityuktamitīdaṃ svoktiviruddham /
GK16visa04cu:591: śabdaśaktyutthe vyañjane tatprapañcasya arthaśaktyutthe vyañjane tatprapañcasya darśitatvāt /
GK16visa04cu:593: na tu darśayiṣyamāṇodāharaṇe 'laṅkārasya vyaṅgyatvāt alaṅkārarūpatayā eka ityukta iti kenaciduktaṃ yuktam /
GK16visa04cu:595: bata vīra / tava dviṣatāṃ parāṅmukhe tvayi parāṅmukhaṃ sarvam” //
GK16visa04cu:596_1: tvāmanuvarttate iti vastuvyañjanāyā api sambhavāt svataḥ sambhavyādyarthavyaṅgyatvena
GK16visa04cu:599: abhavatprasāditasuro mahotsavaḥ pramadājanasya sa cirāya mādhavaḥ” //
GK16visa04cu:602: (vi, ṅa) himamukteti---mādhavaḥ kṛṣṇaḥ pramadājanasya mahotsavo mahotsave hetuścirāya abhavat /
GK16visa04cu:605: sapadmakaḥ padmayā lakṣmyā hastapādastharekhārūpapadmena vā sāhitaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:608: prasāditāḥ prīṇitāḥ surā devā yena tādṛśaśca /
GK16visa04cu:609: atra mādhavo vasanto 'pi śabdaśaktyā arthaśaktyā ca vyajyate /
GK16visa04cu:610: tathā hi mādhavaśabdasya vasante 'pi śaktyā sapadmaka ityatra sapadmakaśabdarūpasya padmasahite 'pi śaktyā,
GK16visa04cu:611: dvijān ityatra dvijaśabdasya pakṣiṣvapi śaktyā janitamīnaketana ityatra surāprasādane 'pyasya śabdasya śaktyā ca vasantapratyāyane śabda śaktiḥ /
GK16visa04cu:613: tataśca vasantasyāprākaraṇikatvena tatpratyāyanasya prakṛte 'nupayogād vasanta iva kṛṣṇa ityupamāpratītiḥ /
GK16visa04cu:616: atra mādhavaḥ kṛṣṇo mādhavo vasanta ivetyupamālaṅkāro vyaṅgyaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:619: (lo, ṝ) himeti---himamuktacandra iva pakṣe himamuktacandreṇa ruciraḥ /
GK16visa04cu:626: atra mādhavaśabdapratipādyatayā harivasantayoḥ aupamyapratipādakasya himamukta ityādiśabdasya śabdaparivṛttisahatvādarthaśakterdārḍhyam /
GK16visa04cu:628: evaṃ ca vyaṅgyabhedādeva vyañjakānāṃ kāvyānāṃ bhedaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:644: (lo, ḷ) śabdaparivṛttisahatvāsahatvābhyāmeva hi sarvatra śabdārthaśaktimūlatvasya vyavasthāpanam /
GK16visa04cu:645: ata eva cāsya bhedasya bahupadaniṣṭatvenaiva sambhavābhiprāyeṇa granthakṛtpadaniṣṭatvaṃ nāstīti vakṣyati /
GK16visa04cu:647: “pathia ṇa ettha“ityādau parivṛttyasaha eva strastarapayodharaśabdayoreva vyañjakatvamiti śabdaśaktimūlatvam /
GK16visa04cu:653: (vi, cha) vākya iti---ubhayaśaktyuttho vyaṅgyo vākyamātravyaṅgya ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:655: tadanye iti---tadanye vyaṅgyāḥ padena vākyena ca vyaṅgyā ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:659: “dhanyaḥ sa eva taruṇo nayane tasyaiva nayane ca /
GK16visa04cu:664: (vi, ja) dvijīyanayataśabda iti---atra lakṣyārthasya atiśayo vyaṅgya iti vakṣyati /
GK16visa04cu:669: atra pratipādyasya saṃmukhīnatvādeva labdhe pratipādyatve tvāmiti punarvacanamanyavyāvṛttiviśiṣṭaṃ tvadarthaṃ takṣayati /
GK16visa04cu:671: tathā viduṣāṃ samavāya ityanenaiva vaktuḥ pratipādane siddhe punarvacmīti vacanamupadiśāmīti vacanaviśeṣarūpamarthaṃ lakṣayati /
GK16visa04cu:673: etena mama vacanaṃ tavātyantaṃ hitaṃ tadavaśyameva kartavyamityabhiprāyaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:698: anyeṣāṃ tu tadupakāritvameveti tanmūlaka eva dhvanivyapadeśaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:705: na tu vyaṅgyam kintu vipralambha eva vyaṅgyaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:706: tadādyanekapadānāṃ cātra na vākyatvaṃ vibhinnavākyasthatvena parasparānanvayāt /
GK16visa04cu:707: na ca tadā sudhāspadamabhūdityatra sarveṣāṃ tadādipadārthānāmanvayāt vākyatvameveti vācyam /
GK16visa04cu:708: tallāvaṇyamityanenaiva vipralambhavyañjanena tadā sudhāspadamityanvayāpekṣāṃ vinaiva vyañjaktvena padatvenaiva vyañjakatvāt /
GK16visa04cu:725: (vi, ṭha) śabdaśaktyudbhavaṃ vastupadavyaṅgyamāha---bhuktimuktikṛditi---upanāyakāgamanaṃ dṛṣṭvā santoṣaṃ vyañjayantyā uktiriyam /
GK16visa04cu:740: atra sadāgamaśabdaḥ sannahitamupanāyakaṃ prati sacchāstrārthamabhidhāya sataḥ puruṣasyāgama iti vastu vyanakti /
GK16visa04cu:745: nanu sadāgamaḥ sadāgama iveti na kathamupamādhvaniḥ ?
GK16visa04cu:757: tasyā āsvādyatvābhāvāt tadupamāyā api anāsvādyatvena tāvatā sambandhīkaraṇasyāpi anupayogāt /
GK16visa04cu:760: rājate ko 'pi jagati sa rājā puruṣottamaḥ” //
GK16visa04cu:768: asya padasyāpi śaktyā vyaṅgyatve 'pi na vākyavyaṅgyatvaṃ puruṣottamapadaśleṣādhīnapratītikatvādasya śliṣṭārthasya /
GK16visa04cu:769: upamādhvaniriti--asya puruṣottamapadasya saṅgopanādiprayojanakatvābhāvena upamāyāmeva tātparyyātsaṃlakṣyakramabhedau vastvalaṅkārau /
GK16visa04cu:772: āścaryaṃ tava saukumāryamabhitaḥ klāntāsi yenādhunā netradvandvamamīlanavyatikaraṃ śaknoti te nāsitum” //
GK16visa04cu:776: snānavartmani upanāyakopabhuktāṃ snātāgatāṃ klāntāṃ saśīṃ prati sakhyā upahāsoktiriyam /
GK16visa04cu:782: nanu snānāduttaraṃ muhūrttadvayātmakasāyaṃkāle ātapasattvāt tata eva klama ityatrāha--yāto 'steti /
GK16visa04cu:787: nanu klamaḥ kathaṃ jāta ityatrāha--yenādhunā iti /
GK16visa04cu:788: yena klamena tava netradvandvam amīlanavyatikaraṃ mīlanasambandharahitaṃ yathā syāttathā āsituṃ sthātuṃ na śakroti /
GK16visa04cu:790: (lo, o) sāyamiti---na vidyate mīlanena vyatikaraḥ samparko yatra tat amīlanavyatikaraṃ yathā syāttathā'situṃ sthātumityarthaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:792: atra svataḥ saṃbhavinā vastunā kṛtaparapuruṣaparicayā klāntāsīti vastu vyajyate /
GK16visa04cu:794: na tu pūrvaṃ kadācidapi tavaivaṃvidhaḥ klamo dṛṣṭa iti bodhayato 'dhunā padasyaivetarapadārthotkarṣādasyaiva padāntarāpekṣayā vaiśiṣṭyam /
GK16visa04cu:802_1: pūrvavarṇṇitavyavasāyād anyā gopakanyakā nirucchvāsatayā niruddhapraṇavāyutayā muktiṃ gatā /
GK16visa04cu:804: jagatsūtiṃ jagajjanakaṃ śrīkṛṣṇaṃ tathāpi samastapāpapuṇyakṣaye eva muktirityatastadupapādayati--tadaprāptīti--taccinteti ca /
GK16visa04cu:807: na tasya prāṇā utkāmanti tatraiva samavalīyante; iti śruteḥ /
GK16visa04cu:811: atra ca vyañjakasya kaviprauḍhoktimantareṇāpi saṃbhavātsvataḥ saṃbhavitā /
GK16visa04cu:814: (vi, da) atreti---tadaprāptiduḥ khasya taccintāhlādasya copabhogena tajjanakapāpapuṇyayoreva kṣayaḥ sambhavati;
GK16visa04cu:820: yathā kamalamanambhasītyatra anukte upameye mukhe upamānakamalāropaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:821: prakṛtānītyatra upameyāni anuktāni uktasukhaduḥ khadūyaṃ cāprakṛtatvāt upamānāni atastadāropādatiśayoktidvayam /
GK16visa04cu:825: atra aśeṣacayapadayorekavākyasthatve 'pi dvābhyāṃ vyaṅgyadvayavyañjanānnaikavākyatvena vyañjakatvamataḥ padatvenaiva vyañjakatvam
GK16visa04cu:830: atra paśyantīti kaviprauḍhoktisiddhena kāvyaliṅgālaṅkāreṇa na ke 'pyanye dātārastava sadṛśā iti vyatirekālaṅkāro 'saṃkhyapadadyotyaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:834: tvaddānajalavāhinyā nadyā asaṃkhyapathagāmitvadarśanāt pathatrayagāminyā gaṅgāyā lajjayā śivāśirasi ātmagopanam /
GK16visa04cu:838: tadevaṃ dhvaneḥ pūrvokteṣvaṣṭādaśasu bhedeṣu madhye śabdārthaśaktyuttho vyaṅgyo vākyamātre bhavannekaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:839: anye punaḥ saptadaśa vākye pade ceti catustriṃśaditi pañcatriṃśadbhedāḥ /
GK16visa04cu:845: tadaprāptimahāduḥ khetyādiślokadvayasya mahāvākyatve 'pi tatra vyañjakapadadvayasattvāt tadvyaṅgyasyaivodāharaṇatvena taddarśitam /
GK16visa04cu:852: priyo vā yadi vā dveṣyaḥ prāṇināṃ gatirīdṛśaī” //
GK16visa04cu:856: asya ca ślokasya padyāntarasacivasyaiva mahāvākyateti spaṣṭārtham /
GK16visa04cu:859: iti divā prabhavato gṛdhrasya śmaśāne mṛtaṃ bālamupādāya tiṣṭhatāṃ taṃ parityajya gamanamiṣṭam /
GK16visa04cu:862: (vi, pa) alaṃ sthitvetyati---śmaśāne mṛtabālakam atyajatastadvandhūn prati gṛdhravākyamidaṃ ślokadvayarūpaṃ mahāvākyam /
GK16visa04cu:865: tathā ca bālakaṃ tyaktvā yūyaṃ gacchadhvamiti vastu svataḥ sambhavivastunaḥ uktaprabandhārthasya vyaṅgyamityarthaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:872: iti niśi samarthasya gomāyordivase parityāgo 'nabhilaṣita iti vākyasamahena dyotyate /
GK16visa04cu:878: vahuvighna iti--tathā ca vighnaśūnyamuhūrttāntare jāvanasambhāvanā darśitā /
GK16visa04cu:883: tathā ca ātrāpi svataḥ sambhavinā etatprabandhārthena vālakaparityāgānabhilāṣarūpaṃ vastu vyajyate ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:890: ataḥ svataḥ sambhavinā vastunā vasuta vyajyate /
GK16visa04cu:891: udāhāryyamiti--tathā ca raghuvaṃśe“samayujyata bhūpatiryuvā“ityādinā“ubhayāṃ siddhimubhāvavāpatuḥ“ityante tulyayogitayā kāvyaliṅgena vā raghurāghavayorvyatirekālaṅkāraḥ pratīyate /
GK16visa04cu:895: yathā māghakāvye śiśupāladūtoktau sandhau kāvye vastumātrarūpo vigrahaḥ upamādhvanirapi tathāvidhaḥ sambhāvyate /
GK16visa04cu:913: “calāpāṅgāṃ dṛṣṭiṃ spṛśasi bahuśo vepathumatīṃ rahasyākhyāyīva svanasi mṛdu karṇāntikacaraḥ /
GK16visa04cu:914: karaṃ vyādhunvatyāḥ pibasi ratisarvasvamadharaṃ vayaṃ tattvānveṣānmadhukara /
GK16visa04cu:916: atra “hatāḥ” iti na punaḥ “duḥkhaṃ prāptavantaḥ” iti hanprakṛteḥ /
GK16visa04cu:919: (vi, bha) calāpāṅgāmitiḥ śakuntalāṃ vyākulayantaṃ bhramaraṃ prati duṣyantasyoktiriyam /
GK16visa04cu:922: kiṃ vā tasya puṣṭakanyātvena matpariṇayayogyā ityevaṃ tattvasyānveṣaṇādityarthaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:927: (lo, i) padāṃśe iti--iha yadyapi prakṛtyādeḥ kevalasya na vyañjakatvam,
GK16visa04cu:930: tathā hyatra hatā ityasya sthāne ktapratyayaṃ sthāpayitvā hanaḥ sthāne prakṛtyantaraniveśane na tathā pratītiḥ /
GK16visa04cu:933: mukhamaṃsavivarti pakṣmalākṣyāḥ kathamapyunnamitaṃ na cumbitaṃ tu” //
GK16visa04cu:937: (vi, ma) muhuraṅgulīti---śakuntalāṃ prāpya tatsambhogavighne sati anutapyasānasya duṣyantasya uktiriyam /
GK16visa04cu:940: atreti---nañā eva cumbanābhāvalābhe tuśabdena cumbasya atyantavyavacchedalābhāt vipralambhānutāpātiśayo vyaṅgyaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:954: bahuvacanasyeti---mama eko 'pyarirnāsti bahu tatsattve sambhāvite viṣādaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:963: tathā hi--yadi luṇṭhane svargo 'pi svalpagrāmaḥ kapratyayavaśāt cātyantasvalpaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:967: nari nari kirati drāk sāyakān puṣpadhanvā puri puri ca nivṛttā māninīmānacarccā //
GK16visa04cu:971: (lo, ī) nyakkāra ityādau udāharaṇadvaye padāṃśavyañjakatvasya prakṛtatve 'pi prasaṅgāt padavyañjakatvakathanam /
GK16visa04cu:973: “rāmo 'sau bhuvaneṣu vikamaguṇaiḥ prāptaḥ prasiddhiṃ parāmasmadbhāgyaviparyayādiha paraṃ devo na jānāti tam /
GK16visa04cu:974: vandī vaiṣa yaśāṃsi gāyati marut yasyaikabāṇāhataśreṇībhūtaviśālaśālavivaroktīrṇaiḥ svaraiḥ saptabhaiḥ” //
GK16visa04cu:976: bhuvaneṣvityatra bahuvacanena guṇairityatra prakṛtyā bahuvacanena ca /
GK16visa04cu:977: te te viśeṣā asmad bhāgyaviparyayādityatra ca na tava na mama kintvasmākaṃ sarveṣāmapi bhāgyaviparyayādityasmadbhāgyaviparyayādityatra na khalvabhāgyāt kintu bhagyaviparyayāt /
GK16visa04cu:979: saṃprati tu anavadhānena tasya viparyayo jāta iti pratipādanādātmānā pratipādanena ca te te sahṛdayasaṃvedyā arthāḥ pratīyante /
GK16visa04cu:980: tathā saktotphulletyādau hareḥ paśyata ityatrānādaraṣaṣṭhyā kiñca na kevalaṃ rasādidhvanereva padāṃśaprakāśatā,
GK16visa04cu:988: nāsāgre nayanaṃ tadetadaparaṃ yaccaikatānaṃ manaḥ . maunaṃ cedamidaṃ ca śūnyamadhunā yadviśvamābhāti te,
GK16visa04cu:994: (vi, ra) āhāre iti--dhyāyantīṃ viyoginīṃ yogadharmiṇīṃ dṛṣṭvā kasyacidiyaṃ pṛcchā /
GK16visa04cu:997: tava sthāne yadā viśvaṃ śūnyamābhāti ityanvayaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:1002: ābhāti” ityupasargasya “sakhi” iti praṇayasmāraṇasya “asi bhoḥ” iti sotprāsasya “kiṃ vā” ityuttarakṣadārḍhyasūcakasya vāśabdasya,
GK16visa04cu:1010: na tu yat kiñcidviṣaye etad viśeṣaṇasya samāsapadaikadeśaḥ,
GK16visa04cu:1018: āṅupasargeṇa mithyātvarūpaṃ samyak pratibhāti iti bhāvabodhanāt vipralambhavyañjanam /
GK16visa04cu:1019: praṇayasmaraṇasyeti--tena dṛśyamāno vipralambho na tvayā gopanīya ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:1052_1: dvādaśapadaikadeśādivyaṅgyāḥ catvāra ityekapañcāśat eṣāṃ parasparayojane saṃkhyāṃ
GK16visa04cu:1053: aṅgāṅgitvarūpeṇa ekāśrayānupraveśarūpeṇa saṃdigdharūpeṇa ca trividhena saṃkareṇa yojane tasya trirūpatā /
GK16visa04cu:1058: ebiryāḥ saṃkhyā bhavanti tā āhavedeti---“aṅkānāṃ vāmataḥ krama';
GK16visa04cu:1064: ekasyaiva svajātīyena ekena svasvajātīyaiḥ pañcāśatā ca caturguṇane ekasyaiva caturadhikadviśatarūpatvam /
GK16visa04cu:1065: evaṃ taduttarasya pūrveṇa saha cāturvidhyaṃ pūrvagaṇanāyāṃ praviṣṭamityataḥ tasya cāturvidhyasya agaṇyatvāt tasya dviśatarūpatvam /
GK16visa04cu:1066: evaṃ taduttarasya pūrvaddhābhyāṃ catuścaturvidhatvasya agaṇyatvāt caturnyūnadviśatarūpatvam /
GK16visa04cu:1067: evaṃ rītyā caramasya caturūpatvamātraṃ guṇyamiti bhavatyuktarūpā saṃkhyā /
GK16visa04cu:1068: kāvyaprakāśe tu darśitakrameṇa kramaśo hrasamāvicāryya sarveṣāmeva caturadhikadviśatarūpatvena ekapañcāśata eva tādṛśasaṃkhyātvena “vedakhāgniviyaccandrāḥ';
GK16visa04cu:1070: vastutastu atyantavicāre vedakhāgniśararūpā yā saṃkhyā granthakṛtā darśitā sāpi na sambhavati /
GK16visa04cu:1071: tathā hi ekapañcāśata eva uktacāturvidhyaṃ na sambhavati,
GK16visa04cu:1077: (lo, ū) tadevamiti---evaṃ vyaṅgyasya padavākyagatatveṅgavṛttau pañcatriṃśadbhedāḥ saṃkhyātāḥ /
GK16visa04cu:1079: rasasya padāṃśavarṇaracanāprabandhagatatvena catvāra iti militvā dhvanikāvyasya ekapañcaśadbhedāḥ śuddhā ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:1081_1: saṃsṛṣṭyā cānyo 'nyamiśraṇe śuddhabhedānāmeva pañcāśataḥ sambhūya vedāścatvāraḥ,
GK16visa04cu:1087: tathā hi prathamabhedasya sajātīyamiśraṇe catvāro bhedāḥ;
GK16visa04cu:1088: vijātīyaiḥ pañcāśatā pratyekaṃ dhvaninā vimaśraṇe catvāro bhedāḥ iti militvā caturadhikaṃ bhedaśatadvayaṃ dvitīyasya bhedaśatadvayameva /
GK16visa04cu:1092: evaṃ tṛtīye 'ṣṭau caturthe dvādaśa iti krameṇānyeṣāmapi svakīyādyabhedāpekṣayā sarveṣāṃ bhedacatuṣṭayapātanam /
GK16visa04cu:1095: pañca agrayaḥ trayaḥ sāyakāḥ pañca evaṃ pañcasahastrāṇi śatatrayaṃ pañcāśat pañca ca;“5355“
GK16visa04cu:1096: jratra agrimāgrimabhedasya yojane ekaikabhedahrāsāt evaṃ prakāreṇa evaṃ yojanaṃ bhavati /
GK16visa04cu:1109: (vi, ṣa) atyunnateti---pravāsādāgacchantaṃ patiṃ dvāri sthitvā dṛṣṭavatīṃ nāyikāṃ kasmiṃścinnivedayataḥ kasyaciduktiriyam /
GK16visa04cu:1124: tathā nistandra unnidraḥ candraḥ tādṛśavadanāyāḥ yad vadanāravindaṃ tasya saurabhyaṃ saugandhyaṃ tasya sauhṛdena saṃparkeṇa sagarvāḥ samīraṇā yatra tādṛśāni /
GK16visa04cu:1125: atreti candrasya nidrābhāvāt tandrāpadasyāprakāśe lakṣaṇā samīraṇasyotkṛṣṭatvaṃ tadvyaṅgyam,
GK16visa04cu:1126: tathā samīraṇasya garvābhāvāt utkṛṣṭe lakṣaṇā sukhasparśatvaṃ tadvyaṅgyam /
GK16visa04cu:1130_0: alidhvanicandrasamīraṇaiḥ kāmoddīpakaiḥ vyaṅgyasya śṛṅgārasya apyatra pratītirityatastasya
GK16visa04cu:1130_1: candrojjvalatvena samīraṇotkṛṣṭatvena tasya sukhasparśatvena ca lakṣaṇāmūlakavyaṅgye
GK16visa04cu:1133: yathā--- khaṇapāhuṇiā deara jāāe kiṃ pide bhāṇiā /
GK16visa04cu:1136: kṣaṇaprāghuṇikā devara jāyayā kimapi te bhaṇitā /
GK16visa04cu:1139: gṛhapatiprasaktāmupanāyikāmutsave tadgṛhāgatāṃ tatpatnyā bhartsitāṃ paścāt gṛhe rudatīmanunetuṃ gṛhapatijyeṣṭhabhrātṛpatnyāḥ sopahāsoktiriyam /
GK16visa04cu:1140: atra kṣaṇa utsavastatra prāghuṇakā abhyāgatā utsavāgatetyarthaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:1141: taddevara sā te tava jāyayākimapyapriyaṃ bhaṇitā satī paścādvalabhīgṛhe roditīti /
GK16visa04cu:1146: ayaṃ kiṃ svataḥ sambhavivastuvyaṅgyavastudhvaniḥ kiṃvā anunayapade upabhogalakṣaṇā;
GK16visa04cu:1147: tadvyaṅgya tasyāḥ duḥ khāpasāraṇamityayamarthāntarasaṃkramitavācyalakṣaṇā mūladhvaniriti dhvanyoḥ saṃśayāspadatvam /
GK16visa04cu:1166: bhedāstasyoditi iti--tasya guṇībhūtavyaṅgyakāvyasya evamaṣṭavidhavyaṅgyabhedāt tasyāṣṭau bhedā uditā ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:1168: (lo, ṝ) evaṃ dhvanyākhyaṃ kāvyasya bhedaṃ nirupya guṇībhūtavyaṅgyamavatārayati atheti--tatra syāditi---kākkā ākṣiptaṃ vācyavat sphuṭīkṛtam /
GK16visa04cu:1182: (vi, ka) rasāderaṅgaṃ rasādi ityubhayatra ādipadāt bhāvādyaṅgatāpi rasādeḥ,
GK16visa04cu:1184: ayaṃ sa iti---bhūriśravasaḥ samarapatitaṃ hastamādāya rudatyāstatpatnyā uraktiriyam /
GK16visa04cu:1185: atreti---rasotkarṣaṇādinā vyaṅgyaḥ śṛṅgāraḥ mṛtālambanakatvena rasatāmanāpanno mṛtālambanakasya karuṇasyāṅgam /
GK16visa04cu:1186: rasatāpannasya tasya śṛṅgāreṇa prakarṣaṇāt pūrvānubhūtasukhasmaraṇe hi karuṇaprakarṣaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:1190: rasaśabdenātra bhāvādīnāmupagrahaḥ ādiśabdena vācyasyāṅgam utkarṣakārirasādi atrādiśabdādanuraṇanarūpam /
GK16visa04cu:1196: hā /hā/ kathaṃ nu bhavato ripurājadhānīprāsādasaṃtatiṣu tiṣṭhati kāmilokaḥ //
GK16visa04cu:1202: bhavato ripurājadhānīprasādasantatiṣu kathaṃ kamilokastiṣṭhati iti anvayaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:1205: tādṛśasandiviśiṣṭānāṃ ripurājadhānīkāmilokānāṃ śocyāvasthājñāturvaktuḥ śokarūpaḥ karuṇo rājaviṣayaratibhāvasyāṅgamityarthaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:1207: śokavyañjaka iti granthakṛto 'bhiprāyaḥ tadaiva vyaṅgyabhūtasya hāhāśabdapratipādyasya śokarūpakaruṇasya vyaṅgyatvopapatteḥ /
GK16visa04cu:1214: “janasthāne bhrāntaṃ kanakamṛgatṛṣṇāndhitadhiyā vaco vaidehīti pratipadamudaśru pralapitam /
GK16visa04cu:1215: kṛtālaṅkābharturvadanaparipāṭīṣu ghaṭanā māyāptaṃ rāmatvaṃ kuśalavasutā na tvadhigatā” //
GK16visa04cu:1220: mayā rāmatvaṃ prāptaṃ rāmasadṛśo 'haṃ jāta ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:1222_0: mayā kanakarūpayā mṛgatṛṣṇayā marīcikāyāndhitadhiyā janānāṃ sthāne bhrāntam asāre
GK16visa04cu:1223: mayā vai iti sambodhya pratipadaṃ sthāne dehīti vacaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:1224_0: mayā bharttuḥ īśvarasya paripāṭīṣu paricaryyāsu aṃlamityarthakā ghaṭanā na kṛtā tadvat
GK16visa04cu:1224_1: rāmeṇāpi laṅkābharttuḥ rāvaṇasya vadanānāṃ mukhānāṃ paripāṭyāṃ paripāṭanasya nimittamiṣughaṭanā kṛtā //
GK16visa04cu:1225: kintu kuśalaṃ dāridṣāpanāyakaṃ vasu dhanaṃ yasya tādṛśatā tu mayā na prāptā /
GK16visa04cu:1226: atra tuśabdena rāmavāk chedāt rāmeṇa tu kuśalavasutā prāptā ityarthaḥ pratīyate--tatra ca kuśalavau sutau yasyāstādṛśī sītetyarthaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:1228: (lo, e) aṅgaparipoṣakatvād vācyāṅgabhūtamanuraṇanarūpaṃ śabdaśaktimūlamudāharati-evaṃ ca rasabhāvāderaṅgaṃ rasabhāvādi,
GK16visa04cu:1238: kābharttuḥ kutsitasvāminaḥ yad vadanaṃ tasya paripāṭīṣu paramparāsu laṅkābharttuḥ rāvaṇasya
GK16visa04cu:1239: vadanānāṃ mukhānāṃ paripāṭyāṃ paṅktau iṣughaṭanā śarayogaśca /
GK16visa04cu:1240: kuśalam āyatiśuddhaṃ vasu dhanaṃ yasya evaṃbhūtatā,
GK16visa04cu:1241: kuśalavau sutau yasyāḥ sā sītā ca /
GK16visa04cu:1248: (vi, gha) atra viṣādādhikyavyañjakayā kuśalavasutāprāptyā prāptatatkāt rāmāt upamānād vailakṣaṇyarūpo vyatirekālaṅkāraḥ naño vācyaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:1250: tadaṅgamiti manasikṛtya vyaṅgyasya sādṛśyasya agūḍhatvāt guṇībhūtatvamupapādayitumāha--atra rāmatvamiti /
GK16visa04cu:1255: tadāropaśca sādṛśyamūlakaḥ ityāha---sādṛśyaheturiti---āviṣkurvātā vaktrā tad gopanaṃ dhvanitvahetutadrūḍhatvam /
GK16visa04cu:1257: yadyapi ekaśabdarūpaṃ sādṛśyaṃ śrotragrāhyameva na tu vākyaṃ,
GK16visa04cu:1259: tathāpi śabdasya sādṛśyatvena rūpeṇa vyaṅgyatvameva na śrotragrahyatvam /
GK16visa04cu:1261: na ca tad gopanāt agūḍharūpaguṇībhūtavyaṅgyaprabheda evāyamiti vācyam /
GK16visa04cu:1265: na tu rāmavyatirekasyānvayaniṣpādakatayā abādhitatvena tad vināpi tanniṣpatteḥ /
GK16visa04cu:1271: ekaviśeṣaṇenāpi tad ghaṭanasambhave bahuviśeṣaṇasambhavāttatprakarṣakatvamapi labhyate tacca sahṛdayaikavedyam /
GK16visa04cu:1273: (lo, ai) atreti vacane tu rāmo 'smītyuktvā punaḥ sādṛśyahetukatādātmyaropaṇaṃ janasthāna ityādi vacanapratipādanenāpi labhyam /
GK16visa04cu:1277: vyaṅgyamiti pāṭhe tu sugamā eva vyākhyā /
GK16visa04cu:1283: “mathnāmi kauravaśataṃ samare na kopādduḥśāsanasya rudhiraṃ na pibāmyutarastaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:1284: saṃcūrṇayāmi gadayā na suyodhanorūṃ sandhi karotu bhavatāṃ nṛpatiḥ paṇena” //
GK16visa04cu:1285: atra mathnāmyevetyādivyaṅgyaṃ vācyasya niṣedhasya sahabhāvenaiva sthitam /
GK16visa04cu:1290: mathnāmīti---duryoghanena saha sandhikaraṇe pravṛttaṃ yudhiṣṭhiraṃ śrutvā kuddhasya bhīmasya sahadevaṃ pratyuktiriyam /
GK16visa04cu:1291: bhavatāmityanena asmākam asamīhitakāritvāt nāsmākaṃ nṛpatiriti sūcitam /
GK16visa04cu:1295: tayā vyañjanayā aparanañor'thopasthāpanāt na mathnāmītyartho labhyate /
GK16visa04cu:1310: (vi, ca) vācyasiddhyaṅgamudāharati---anupannasya vācyārthasya yad vyaṅgyānvayenaiva siddhiḥ tādṛśaṃ vyaṅgyaṃ vācyasiddhyaṅgam /
GK16visa04cu:1313_0: anvayasāya vairikulasya vaṃśapadavācyasya veṇutvaropaṇarūpo vyaṅgaya iti kulaveṇudvayārthakasya
GK16visa04cu:1313_1: vaṃśapadasya prakaraṇāt kule niyantraṇena veṇo stad vyaṅgyatvena tadrūpaṇasyāpi vyaṅgyatvāt
GK16visa04cu:1313_2: davānalatvāropasiddhyaṅgamiti kule davā nalavādhena veṇāveda tad bādhāt /
GK16visa04cu:1315: yadi prakaraṇavaśāt anekārthasya vaṃśapadasya prathamaṃ kulabodhakatvam;
GK16visa04cu:1316: tadaiva veṇurūpor'tho vyaṅgyo bhavati tadeva tu na;
GK16visa04cu:1318: kintu kulaveṇyorubhayorekadā eva davānalānvayārthaṃ tātparyyād vaṃśayorupasthityā arthadvayameva vācyam /
GK16visa04cu:1319: natu veṇurūpor'tho vyaṅgyastathā ca paramparitarūpamevedaṃ veṇutvarūpaṇasya davānalarūpaṇakāraṇatvāt tad vakṣyati svayameva--- “yatra kasyacidāropaḥ parāropasya kāraṇam /
GK16visa04cu:1325: “iti atra hi rājamaṇḍalasya grāsakarūpasambandhitayā rāhuvādhāt bāhau rāhurūpaṇamanupapannamato nṛpamaṇḍale candramaṇḍalatvasyāropo bāhau rāhurupaṇakāraṇamiti /
GK16visa04cu:1326: ata eva kāvyaprakāśakṛtāpi sadvaṃśamuktāmaṇirityatra rājño muktāmaṇyāropaṇasya satkule bādhāt satkule saha veṇuropaṇaṃ tatkāraṇamityuktam /
GK16visa04cu:1330: na hi dīpayan ityādau āhave jagaduddaṇḍetyādau ca ekasya vācyasiddhyaṅgatvamanyasya paramparitarūpakatvamityatravinigamakaṃ nāsti /
GK16visa04cu:1332: darśanena bhavataḥ kiṃ tṛptirutpadyate kintvevaṃ vijanasthagrerhatajanaḥ sambhāvayatyanyathā /
GK16visa04cu:1337: madvidhanāyikādarśanenāpi dhairyyacyutarahita ityevaṃvidhāyāḥ bhaṅgyāḥ pratītyaiva siddhayati /
GK16visa04cu:1338: na ca nṛpamaṇḍale candramaṇḍalāropaṇamapi vyaṅgyaṃ sadevālaṅkāraḥ /
GK16visa04cu:1341: prathamaṃ nṛpamaṇḍale rāhoranvayāsambhāvena rājamaṇḍalapadādekadaiva nṛpacandramaṇaaḍalayoḥ upasthityā drayorapi vācyatvācca /
GK16visa04cu:1342: nanu tatkatham--- bhramimaratimalasahṛdayatāṃ praṇayaṃ mūrcchāṃ tamaḥ śarīrasādam /
GK16visa04cu:1343: maraṇaṃ ca jaladadabhujagajaṃ prasahya kurute viṣaṃ viyoginīnām /
GK16visa04cu:1344: “ityatra viśeṣajale rūpetaṃ halāhalaṃ vyaṅgyaṃ bhujagarupaṇasiddhikṛdityuktyā halāhalasya vyaṅgyatvamuktvā kāvyaprakāśakṛtā vācyasiddhyaṅgodāharaṇatvena taduktamiti cenna /
GK16visa04cu:1345: tatra uddīpakatayā prākaraṇikamanekārthasya viṣaśabdasyārtho jalam ityato 'prākaraṇikaṃ halāhalaṃ vyaṅgyamityuktam /
GK16visa04cu:1346: na ca dīpayannityatrāpi prākaraṇikatvena vaṃśapadārthakulavācyaṃ veṇustu aprākaraṇiko vyaṅgya eveti vācyam /
GK16visa04cu:1347: davānalarūpaṇasyāpi tātparyyaviṣayatvena tasya kule bādhena tadupapādanatayā veṇorapi prākaraṇikatvāt /
GK16visa04cu:1350: bhramimaratimityādau tu jalade bhujagarūpaṇaṃ śyāmatvenāpakāritvena ca jale halāhalarūpaṇaṃ vināpi āpātataḥ siddhatyeveti halāhalamaprākaraṇikamityato vyaṅgyameva /
GK16visa04cu:1351: parantu praṇidhāne sati jalasya bhujagajanyatvāsambhavena bhajagarūpaṇāsiddhyā tatsiddhikāritvena paścājjale halāhalarūpaṇamiti /
GK16visa04cu:1359: kiṃ vācyārthena kiṃ vā vyaṅgyārthena vyañjito 'yaṃ ityevaṃ sandehaviṣayatvaṃ tattvam /
GK16visa04cu:1360: halastviti kumārasambhave ākālike vasante jāte sarveṣāmeva kāmodreke sati halasyāpi kiñcit tathātvavarṇanamidam /
GK16visa04cu:1364: cumbanābhilāṣastu vyaṅgyaḥ taddvayamapi śṛṅgāranubhāvastat kena raso vyañjita iti sandehāt /
GK16visa04cu:1367: dhairyyaparivṛtteḥ kiñcittvena cumbanābhilāṣo jāto na vā;
GK16visa04cu:1368: iti sandehena nadīyarasavyañjakatāyā api tadadhīnasandehāt ata eva vācyārthena tadvyañjanamapi saṃdigdhameva /
GK16visa04cu:1374: atra paraśurāmo rakṣaḥkulakṣayaṃ kariṣyatīti vyaṅgyasya vācyasya ca samaṃprādhānyam /
GK16visa04cu:1377: (vi, ja) tulyaprādhānyamāha---brāhmaṇeti---digvijaye paraśurāmaṃ jigīṣuṃ rāvaṇaṃ prati tadamātyasya tattrāsakavākyamidam /
GK16visa04cu:1378: bhavatāmeva bhūtaye na tu svārtha bravīmītyarthaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:1388: atreti--atra vācyavyaṅgyayoḥ sāmadaṇḍayostulyatayaiva vairamocane paryyāptātvādaprastutapraśaṃsāvat parasparānapekṣayā camatkārāspadatvāt dvayorapi samaṃ prādhānyam /
GK16visa04cu:1392: atrāllāvadīnākhye nṛpatau dānasāmādimantareṇa nānyaḥ praśamopāya iti vyaṅgyaṃ vyutpannānāmapi jhaṭityasphuṭam /
GK16visa04cu:1396: jhaṭityasphuṭamiti tat praśamopāyo nāstyeva iti hi vyaṅgyamāpātataḥ pratibhāti /
GK16visa04cu:1406: atra pratīyamāno 'pi śākyamunestiryagyoṣiti bālātkāropabhogaḥ sphuṭatayā vācyāyamāna ityagūḍham /
GK16visa04cu:1411: ahaṃ vratavatīti dharmopadeśinaḥ asya upabhogo mama vratabhaṅgāya no bhaviṣyatītyato 'haṃ vratavatyeva ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:1412: svairaṃ svacchandam ataḥ param uktena kiṃ prayojanamityarthaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:1414: pratīyamānasya prāyaśo 'sphuṭatvena sphuṭatve tad virodhe 'trāpikāraḥ sphuṭatayeti---prabandhaślokātprakaraṇavaśād balātkaropabhogajñānāt sphuṭatā /
GK16visa04cu:1419: prajjvālitasya rajanīṃ madanānalasya dhūmaṃ dadhat prakaṭalāñchanakaitavena” /
GK16visa04cu:1420: atra cumbīti pade vadanasaṃsargarūpasāyarthasyāsambhavāt saṃsargamātraṃ lakṣyaṃta tadatiśayaścābhidheyavat sphuṭaṃ pratīyate /
GK16visa04cu:1424: atra dattasaṃketaḥ jaścillatāgṛhaṃ praviṣṭa iti vyaṅgyāt “sīdantyaṅgani” iti vācyasya camatkāraḥ sahṛdayasaṃvedya ityasundaram /
GK16visa04cu:1432: vānīrakuñje kṛtasaṃketāyā gṛhakarmavyāpārāt tatra gantumaśaktāyā vadhvā aṅgāvasādavarṇanamidam /
GK16visa04cu:1433: atreti--praviṣṭa ityantamātraṃ na vyaṅgyaṃ vadhvāstatrāgamanasyāpi tadīyapakṣikolāhalaśravaṇādhīnāṅgāvasādena vyaṅgyatvāt /
GK16visa04cu:1434: tathā ceti--vyaṅgyādityatra ityādi vyaṅgyādityarthaḥ vācyasya camatkāra iti vadhvā vipralambhavyañjakatvena hyatra camatkāraḥ /
GK16visa04cu:1436: vadhvā īdṛśakāryyatyāgenāpi tatrāgamanasambhavādṛte vācyāṅgāvasādamukhaprekṣatvena tasya nyūnacamatkāritetyarthaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:1442: kiñca yo dīpakatulyayogitādiṣūpamādyalaṅkāro vyaṅgyaḥ sa guṇībhūtavyaṅgya eva /
GK16visa04cu:1446: tatparatvaṃ na kāvyasya nāsau mārgo dhvanermataḥ” //
GK16visa04cu:1449: (vi, ṭha) asundarasya bahūnyudāharaṇāni sambhavantīti darśayitumāha---kiñca yo dīpaketi /
GK16visa04cu:1454: alaṅkārāntarasyāpi pratītau satyāṃ yaccālaṅkārāntaraṃ bhasata ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:1458: yatreti pāṭhe tu yatra kāvye bhāsate ityalaṅkāra iti kartṛpadamadhyāhāryyam /
GK16visa04cu:1460: (lo, u) idānīmanyatrāpi vyaṅgyasya guṇībhāvasthale dhvanibhramaṃ nirasyan āha---kiñceti /
GK16visa04cu:1462: kāvyasya ca tatparatvaṃ na bhāsata iti sambandhaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:1467_1: hi dhvanitvaṃ tad viparyyāso vyaktīkāraṇaṃ yatra śabdāntarādinā kriyate so 'gūḍharūpaguṇībhūtavyaṅgyaprabheda ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:1471: goparāgahṛtayā kiṃcinna dṛṣṭaṃ mayā tenātra skhalitāsmi nātha /
GK16visa04cu:1473: ekastvaṃ viṣameṣu khinnamanasāṃ sarvābalānāṃ gatir- gopyevaṃ gaditaḥ saleśamavatādroṣṭhe harirvaściram” //
GK16visa04cu:1476: (vi, ḍha) dṛṣṭyeti---keśavaṃ dṛṣṭvā madanāndhatayā goṣṭe patitāyā gopyāḥ saleśaṃ saśleṣaṃ gadito hariściramavatāt /
GK16visa04cu:1477: dṛṣṭyetyādi--saśleṣoktiḥ tatra vācyārtho yathā---he keśava gavāṃ parāgeṇa rajasā hṛtayā naṣṭayā dṛṣṭyā mayā kiñcit na dṛṣṭam /
GK16visa04cu:1480: he nātha / patitāṃ māṃ kiṃ nālambase /
GK16visa04cu:1481: kathamālambiṣye ityatrāha---ekastvamiti---viṣameṣūñcanīceṣu vartmasu khinnamanasāṃ patnena klāntahṛdayānāṃ sarvābalānāṃ sakalabalarahitānāṃ strīṇāṃ puṃsāṃ ca yatastvaṃ gatiriti /
GK16visa04cu:1483: rāgeṇa tvayyanurāgeṇa hṛtayā dṛṣṭyā mayā kiñcinnijatiroṣādikaṃ na dṛṣṭam /
GK16visa04cu:1485: he nātha / patitāṃ patibhāvaṃ bharttṛtvaṃ kiṃ nāma nālambase nāśrayasi /
GK16visa04cu:1486: yato viṣameṣuṇā pañceṣuṇā khinnamanasāṃ sarvāsām abalānāṃ tvameko gatiriti /
GK16visa04cu:1488: (lo, ū) dṛṣṭyeti---gavāṃ parāgeṇa rajasā hṛtayā tiraskṛtayā /
GK16visa04cu:1489: gāḥ indriyāṇi sambhāgadānādinā pātīti gopaḥ tasmin gope tvayi,
GK16visa04cu:1490: rāgeṇa pramṇā hṛtayā vaśīkṛtayā skhalitā bhraṣṭapādā gatadhairyyā ca /
GK16visa04cu:1491: atha patitāṃ mārgapatitāṃ dhavatvaṃ ca nāvalambase na dhārayasi na parigṛhaṇāsi ca /
GK16visa04cu:1496: atra goparāgādiśabdānāṃ gope rāga ityādivyaṅgyārthānāṃ saleśamiti padena sphuṭatayāvabhāsaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:1499: (vi, ṇa) sphuṭayeti---śleṣavaśādeva tatpratīteḥ saleśapadena tat sphuṭīkaraṇam /
GK16visa04cu:1501: na tvanaucityapravarttitarūparasābhāsaḥ tad gopane 'pi paranāyakaviṣayatvena tadavaśyaṃbhāvāt /
GK16visa04cu:1505: yatra vastvalaṅkārasādirūpavyaṅgyānāṃ rasābhyantare guṇībhāvastatra pradhānakṛta eva kāvyavyavahāraḥ /
GK16visa04cu:1508: (vi, ta) kvacittu vyaṅgye guṇībhūte 'pi dhvanikāvyavyavahāra eva na guṇībhūtavyavahāra ityāha---kiñcātra yatra vastviti /
GK16visa04cu:1511: na cedaṃ kathamupapadyate īdṛśasthale 'parāṅgākhyaguṇībhūtavyaṅgyasyaivoktatvāt iti vācyam,
GK16visa04cu:1512: yatra guṇībhūtānāmalaṅkārasādīnāmaṅgijanakatvameva natvaṅgi prakarṣakatvaṃ tatraivāṅgino vyañjakaviśeṣaṇatvenāṅgina eṣa camatkāritvāt dhvanivyavahārat /
GK16visa04cu:1513_0: yathā ca calāpāṅgāṃ dṛṣṭimityatra madhukarakāmukarūpālaṅkārasya vyaṅgyasya hatā iti
GK16visa04cu:1514: yathā--- “jāne kopaparāṅmukhī priyatamā svapne 'dya dṛṣṭā mayā mā māṃ saṃspṛśa pāṇineti rudatī gantuṃ pravṛttā tataḥ /
GK16visa04cu:1515: no yāvat parirabhya cāṭukaśatairāśvāsayāmi priyāṃ bhratastāvadahaṃ śaṭhena vidhinā nidrāharidrīkṛtaḥ” //
GK16visa04cu:1516: ityatra vidhiṃ pratyasūyādhvanireva śaṭhapadena vyañjakaviśeṣeṇa vyaktaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:1517: no yāvadāśvāsayāmi ityanena vyaṅgyasya vipralambhasya tu asūyājanakatvameva nāsūyāprakarṣakatvamityato nāparāṅgatvamityādi svayamūhyam /
GK16visa04cu:1520: pradhānena rasenaiva kāvyavyavahāro na tu guṇībhūtavyaṅgyena /
GK16visa04cu:1521: tathā ca tatrottamakāvyatvameva ityarthaḥ yathā“ayaṃ sa rasanotkarṣo“tyādaveva hi tatra śṛṅgārasya guṇībhāve 'pi taṃ bhāgamavalambya madhyamakāvyavyavahāro 'pi na karttavyaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:1530: kvacittu prakāraṇagmye vastuni tātparyyasattvena aṅgībhūtarasādau tātparyyābhāve 'pi āpātataścamatkāribhistairaṅgabhūtai rasādyaireva parāṅgavyavahāra ityāha /
GK16visa04cu:1536: (vi, da) yatra tu yatronmadānāmiti---atra pure 'bhraṃlihaḥ meghasparśo śoṇamaṇīmayūkhaḥ padmarāgamaṇīnāṃ raśmiḥ /
GK16visa04cu:1537: sandhyābhramaṃ tādṛśaraśmisañcaraṇādeva sandhyākāle iti bhrāntiṃ prāpnuvatāmunmadānāṃ madanamattānāṃ pramadājanānāmanaṅganepathyavidhiṃ kāmasambhogaveśaṃ vidhatta ityanvayaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:1544: (vi, dha) atra hi prakaraṇāt purāprakarṣe tātparyyasattvena anaṅganepathyavidhānavyaṅgyasya śṛṅgārasya tātparyyaviṣayatvābhāve 'pi āpātataścamatkāritvalābhenaivāparāṅgavyavahāraḥ /
GK16visa04cu:1548: kālāntare tu prakaraṇādiparyālocanayā bhavannapyasau na kāvyavyavadeśaṃvyāhantumīśaḥ,
GK16visa04cu:1556: tatra āpātatastadananubhave 'pi uttarakālaṃ prakaraṇādiparyyālocanayā purīprakarṣaprādhānyāvagamo bhavannapi kāvyasya guṇībhūtavyaṅgyavyapadeśaṃ vyāhantuṃ neśa ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:1559: tathāca apradhānenāpi śṛṅgāreṇā'svādāt na guṇībhūtavyaṅgyavyapadeśa ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:1573: tanna, yadi hi avyaṅgyatvena vyaṅgyābhāvastadā tasya kāvyatvamapi nāstīti prāgevoktam /
GK16visa04cu:1576: (vi, pa) kāvyaprakāśakṛtā citrākhyaṃ tṛtīyaṃ kāvyamucyate taddūṣayitumāha---keciditi /
GK16visa04cu:1580: saguṇāviti taiḥ kāvyalakṣaṇe kṛte vyaṅgyarasadvāreṇaiva ca saguṇatvena vyaṅgyābhāve saguṇatvābhāvāt kāvyatvaṃ nāstītyarthaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:1594: āsvādyavyaṅgyatve eva kāvayatvāṅgīkārāt idaṃ ca svakapolakalpitaṃ dūṣaṇam /
GK16visa04cu:1596: nanu āsvādye eva tāratamyānna prācīnadvayāntarbhāva ityata āha---yadi cāsvādyatvamiti---tadā kṣudratvameveti---prācīnabhedadvayāt asyālpatvamevetyarthaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:1597: astu tāvat kṣudratvaṃ tu kāvyatvāprayojakatvenānupādeyatvādanāsvādyatvameva ityāha---kṣudratāyāmiti---tathā ca dhvaniguṇībhūtavyaṅgyākhyaṃ dvayameva kāvyam /
GK16visa04cu:1598: citrākhyaṃ padyaṃ na tu kāvyamiti bhāvaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:1609: evamuktaprabandhena vyaṅgyasya pradhānaguṇabhāvābhyām ubha eva kāvye vyavasthite /
GK16visa04cu:1611: tatra kāvyavyavahārastu sādharmyād gauṇa iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:1617: ucyate vakṣyate ca--tasya ca vyaṅgyasya prādhānyāprādhānyābhyāṃ dhvaniguṇībhūtavyaṅgyākhyau dvau bhedau,
GK16visa04cu:1618: tayorapi pratyekaṃ vyaṅgyasya vastvalaṅkārasarūpatvena traividhyamityuktaprakāreṇātmanā eva ātmano bhedaḥ prabhedaśca /
GK16visa04cu:1619: iti durupapādaḥ sāmānyalaśraṇaśca vyāpteḥ iti cet;
GK16visa04cu:1620: atrocyate-yadi vayaṃ rasavattvākhyasya kāvyasāmānyalakṣaṇasya vastvalaṅkāravyaṅgyayoḥ kāvyabhedayorabhāvaṃ brūmaḥ tadaiṣa
GK16visa04cu:1631: ata evāhuḥ---rasādyapekṣayā tu sarvaguṇābhāvavyabhicāra eva iti /
GK16visa04cu:1632: nanu tarhi kathaṃ niḥśeṣacyutacandanamityādau vastudhvaneḥ prādhānyaṃ,
GK16visa04cu:1633: tatra hi dautyakarmajīvikāyāṃ kṛtaghnāyāṃ tvayi tasmin adhame śaṭhe ca mama nāsūyā,
GK16visa04cu:1640: nanvevamalaṃ yathākathañcit prādhānyamupakalpya vastvalaṅkārarūpayordhvaniguṇībhūtavyaṅgyoḥ kāvyavyavahārapravarttakoktyā rasadhvanināpi sa nivarttatāmiti cet,
GK16visa04cu:1641: atrāha kāvyaprakāśakāraḥ---“samanantaroktaṃ yadyapi sa nāsti kaścidviṣaya iti /
GK16visa04cu:1642: pradhānaṃ cāpātamātreṇa āparyantaṃ pradhānena rasena eva vyapadeśaḥ” /
GK16visa04cu:1643: tathā tenaivoktamalaṅkāraprastāve---“rasādirūpastadvyaṅgyor'tholaṅkārāntaraṃ ca sarvatrāvyabhicārītyagaṇayitvā eva tadalaṅkārā udāhṛtāḥ” /
GK16visa04cu:1647: yatra khalu samāsoktyādyalaṅkāreṣu vyaṅgyasya vaiṣadyenāpi pratītiḥ,
GK16visa04cu:1654: kiñca kvacit kadācit yatrālaṅkāre vyaṅgyasyāsvādaprakarṣakatvena prādhānyamapi yathāprastutapraśaṃsāyāṃ---
GK16visa04cu:1655: “jaṃ vellihiṇa ma asi jaṃ cāsi paraviraṃ pilaghemaṃ /
GK16visa04cu:1656: tamaṇḍe kohali ajjaṃ valaṃ piphuli haṃsi” //
GK16visa04cu:1657: ityādāvacamatkāraiṇaḥ kuṇḍākarṣaṇārthāt prastutāt gṛhakarmaratyā yuvānaṃ prati nāyikāyā aprasaṅganiṣedhāya prastutasya bālāyā yauvanodbhedakathanasya tasya dhvanau antarbhāvo 'stu,
GK16visa04cu:1659: evaṃ cālaṅkāreṣu guṇībhūtavyaṅgyasyāntarbhāve eṣa eva nyāyaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:1660: kiñca dīpakatulyayogitādau yeyamupapādyālaṅkāṇṇāṃ pratītirna tatra guṇībhūtavyaṅgyākhyākāvyabhedāntaḥ pāto 'nāsvādyatvāt vyaṅgyasya,
GK16visa04cu:1662: ata eva kavipratibhāsaṃrambhagocaratvaṃ teṣu nāstīti vācyam /
GK16visa04cu:1664: kintu vācyāpekṣayā āsvādapakarṣa iti teṣu ucito guṇībhūtavyaṅgyākhyakāvyavyavahāraḥ /
